title: Assignment of functions
context: ยง26-23 Assignment of functions. Any executive or administrative function of the state government that may not have been allocated to a principal department by this chapter shall be assigned by the governor to that department which the governor deems can most appropriately and effectively perform the function. [L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, ยง37; Supp, ยง14A-33; HRS ยง26-23; gen ch 1985]
